SELECT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM party_member pm JOIN characters c ON pm.character_id = c.id WHERE pm.party_id = #{partyId} AND c.user_id = #{userId})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM party_member pm JOIN characters c ON pm.character_id = c.id JOIN parties p ON pm.party_id = p.id WHERE pm.party_id = #{partyId} AND p.user_id = c.user_id

SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS partyId, p.name AS partyName, u.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.capacity, p.party_type AS partyType, COUNT(DISTINCT c.user_id) AS currentJoinedMembers FROM parties p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN party_member pm ON p.id = pm.party_id JOIN characters c ON pm.character_id = c.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY p.id, p.name, u.nickname, p.capacity, p.party_type ORDER BY p.id
